Kevin

Riwon

Introduction

Monogram (Korean: 모노그램; Japanese: モノグラム) is a co-ed duet under SidusHQ. The group consists of Kevin and Riwon. They debuted on September 23rd, 2017.

They are assumed to have silently disbanded some time in 2020, as their social media has not been updated since January of that year.
